It's a great game, with all new maps and weapons. It's 100% awesome but please fix the game serveries. Getting kicked from a match because of connection issues is not right. There should be no peanlty if connection to a game has been lost due to serveries being down. Still a fun game to play.

As a very experienced counter strike player, I can strongly recommend this game. Everything is there, the concept, the excitement, and the fun all packaged into one amazing game. Honestly, with the adaptability of life and how we are changing in our daily modern life, we need to acknowledge these improvements. As we change, the progress of human nature, science, and life must change with out or they will stay behind and not catch up with the rest of the world. This is my opinion of CSGO
